title: Kalista bugged when trying to rebind soul
body:
Kalista was soul binded to lux, then she bought another spear and tried to bind with me (nautalis) but wasn't working.
I'm assuming this is a bug?

replies.body:
Hey Squanchers! 

Were you trying to rebind after the 3 minute mark? You're only able to rebind to another player before 3 minutes.
Ohhh! Yes it was definitely after the 3 minute mark. I was unaware of this. Sorry for the inconvenience. Thank you for clearing that up for me!
Not an inconvenience! Glad to help!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Ff5QRU2a,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-19T22:07:12.244+0000)
>
> Not an inconvenience! Glad to help!

May I ask why you can only rebind before the 3 minute mark? Just for curiosity's sake. :o
I'm on skins, but my guess is so you can't bind to your 9-0 Malphite half way through the game, when you've originally binded to your support.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Ff5QRU2a,comment-id=00000000000000010001,timestamp=2016-02-22T19:44:46.624+0000)
>
> I'm on skins, but my guess is so you can't bind to your 9-0 Malphite half way through the game, when you've originally binded to your support.

Aaah it makes sense! :D

If I'm not mistaken, binding someone is supposed to be a permanent decision that lasts the whole game, and letting Kalista rebind within the first three minutes I believe is supposed to be there in case the Kalista player accidentally binded to the wrong target.

Oooh, makes sense!

(I do not play Kalista, so I honestly don't know much about how she works other than when I'm her bind.)
Could this possibly be altered on ARAM?
Can we please remove that 3 minute mark? :/
